root.title: addit ccc credit guarante hungari
root.body: commod credit corpor ccc author addit 8.0 mln dlr credit guarante sale veget protein meal hungari fiscal year 1987 u.s. agricultur depart sai addit guarante increas veget protein meal credit line 16.0 mln dlr increas cumul fiscal year 1987 program agricultur product 23.0 mln dlr 15.0 mln sai depart also announc extens export period septemb 30 1987 decemb 31 sale veget protein meal elig credit guarante sale must regist export later septemb 30
